title: Daily play rewards glitch
body: I am a new player, levelling up my account and previously when I have completed the missions I have selected one out of three champions. Most recently when I completed the missions I went to select a champion I was unable to, I can place my cursor over a champion and the 'select' button will appear however when I attempt to hover over the button, it vanishes. Every time now when I attempt to restart my game and login using my account this screen is all that appears.

replies.body: This helped me pass through the glitch in most of my accounts, but not 100 percent sure if it works every time. Once you get to the screen glitch hover over the spot which pops up the character selection and ability list; once it pops up stay on it so the selection stays and just start pressing the 'esc' button. I tend to just press it as much as I can and It should bring you back to the lobby. Hopefully this works for you guys as well.
Much Love. Thank you God for giving him this revelation to semi fix problem.
How is it possible this bug is not fixed ?? It has been two months and Im still getting it every day !
Omg thank you! i tryed to find ways to fix the bug like reinstalling it and spamming my keys... and thank god i saw this :)
I'm having the same issue. It sucks because I really wanted to give this game a try after being somewhat proficient at Smite. So the MOBA aspect seemed great.

I found a fix.  I am not sure it works for you or not, but it did work for me.

when the 3 champion portraits show up, press and hold the "Alt" Key, and move the mouse cursor to select one of the champions, while I was holding the "Alt" key, the button won't disappear.

too be more specific on my computer, after I open the LOL, the window pops up, and then the Daily Play shows up.  I have 3 champions to choose from.  the mouse cursor is like normal window cursor, not like the special cursor in the game.  the only when the cursor was floating on the lower part of the champion portrait, the 2 buttons "View Abilities" and "Select" would show up in the middle of the champion portrait.  However, when I was trying to move the cursor to any of these buttons, away from bottom part of the portrait, these 2 button disappear.

I tried as change my password on website and log in again, the same issue persists.
I have the exactly same issue too.

I am also experiencing this glitch. I had unfortunately checked the option to leave myself logged in as well so I cant even log in to a different account. Every time I try to open the game I just go right back to being stuck with no way to play or move on. Please fix this problem ASAP.

If you can't sign-out when closing the client, one workaround is to login to the website and change your password. Doing so will boot your account from client until you put in the new password, and you will be able to uncheck the "stay logged in" box.
I'm also suffering this glitch, help would be appreciated

>Thanks for reporting this, we'll need to gather some logs to investigate further. If you'd like to help us dig into this:

>1. Please download and install the [Hextech Repair Tool (HRT)](https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/player-support/tools/hextech-repair-tool/latest/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi). (If you've already got the HRT installed, uninstall it and then install this latest version.
2. Once you've opened the HRT, deselect the "Automatically Assign" and "Add Firewall Exceptions" options, we won't be needing those.
3. Click Start.
4. A .zip file will be created on your desktop called LoL Logs. Attach this file in an email to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

>We will then pass these logs on for investigation.
